name: Little Manouvers
description:
How to Play:

Save the mothership from the enemy spaceships

by pushing it using helper's spacecraft

or pulling using magnet

Tips:

Enemy spaceships have a chance to drop repair kits,

pick them up using mothership. Don't evade them!

Your helper's spacecraft can't get hit by the enemies

focus on helping the mothership

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Activate Magnet
